query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, COUNT(CASE WHEN reemplazo IS NULL OR reemplazo = '' THEN 1 END) as sin_reemplazo, COUNT(CASE WHEN reemplazo IS NOT NULL AND reemplazo != '' THEN 1 END) as con_reemplazo FROM planesSustitucion WHERE puestoClave = 'Si';
